file.name: rest-openapi.yaml
file.content:
components:
    schemas:
        BillingAddress:
            properties:
                city:
                    example: Diamond Bar
                    type: string
                countryISOCode:
                    example: US
                    type: string
                description:
                    example: right stairs, first room on the left
                    type: string
                id:
                    example: 31130
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                latitude:
                    example: 33.9976884
                    format: double
                    type: number
                longitude:
                    example: -117.8144595
                    format: double
                    type: number
                name:
                    example: Alessio Antonio Rendina
                    type: string
                phoneNumber:
                    example: (123) 456 7890
                    type: string
                regionISOCode:
                    example: CA
                    type: string
                street1:
                    example: 1400 Montefino Ave
                    type: string
                street2:
                    example: 1st floor
                    type: string
                street3:
                    example: suite 200
                    type: string
                vatNumber:
                    example: "353246836565"
                    type: string
                zip:
                    example: "91765"
                    type: string
            required:
                - city
                - countryISOCode
                - name
                - street1
            type: object
        Error:
            properties:
                errorCode:
                    description:
                        Internal error code mapping
                    example: 996
                    readOnly: true
                    type: integer
                errorDescription:
                    example: Unable to find currency. Currency code should be expressed with
                        3-letter ISO 4217 format.
                    readOnly: true
                    type: string
                message:
                    example: No CommerceCurrency exists with the key {groupId=41811, code=US
                        Dollar}
                    readOnly: true
                    type: string
                status:
                    description:
                        HTTP Status code
                    example: 404
                    readOnly: true
                    type: integer
            required:
                - errorCode
                - errorDescription
                - message
                - status
            type: object
        Order:
            properties:
                accountExternalReferenceCode:
                    example: AAB-34098-789-N
                    type: string
                accountId:
                    example: 30130
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                advanceStatus:
                    example: trasmitted
                    type: string
                billingAddress:
                    $ref: "#/components/schemas/BillingAddress"
                billingAddressId:
                    example: 31130
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                channelId:
                    example: 30130
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                couponCode:
                    example: save20
                    type: string
                createDate:
                    example: 2017-07-21
                    format: date
                    type: string
                currencyCode:
                    example: USD
                    type: string
                customFields:
                    additionalProperties: true
                    type: object
                externalReferenceCode:
                    example: AB-34098-789-N
                    type: string
                id:
                    example: 30130
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                items:
                    items:
                        $ref: "#/components/schemas/OrderItem"
                    type: array
                lastPriceUpdateDate:
                    example: 2017-07-21
                    format: date
                    type: string
                modifiedDate:
                    example: 2017-08-21
                    format: date
                    type: string
                orderDate:
                    example: 2017-07-21
                    format: date
                    type: string
                orderStatus:
                    example: 0
                    format: int32
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                paymentMethod:
                    example: paypal
                    type: string
                paymentStatus:
                    example: 0
                    format: int32
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                printedNote:
                    example: Order printed note
                    type: string
                purchaseOrderNumber:
                    example: Abcd1234
                    type: string
                requestedDeliveryDate:
                    example: 2017-07-21
                    format: date
                    type: string
                shippingAddress:
                    $ref: "#/components/schemas/ShippingAddress"
                shippingAddressId:
                    example: 31130
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                shippingAmount:
                    example: 12
                    format: bigdecimal
                    minimum: 0
                    type: number
                shippingDiscountAmount:
                    example: 11
                    format: bigdecimal
                    minimum: 0
                    type: number
                shippingDiscountPercentageLevel1:
                    example: 20
                    format: bigdecimal
                    minimum: 0
                    type: number
                shippingDiscountPercentageLevel2:
                    example: 0
                    format: bigdecimal
                    minimum: 0
                    type: number
                shippingDiscountPercentageLevel3:
                    example: 0
                    format: bigdecimal
                    minimum: 0
                    type: number
                shippingDiscountPercentageLevel4:
                    example: 0
                    format: bigdecimal
                    minimum: 0
                    type: number
                shippingMethod:
                    example: fixed
                    type: string
                shippingOption:
                    example: by Air
                    type: string
                subtotal:
                    example: 101
                    format: bigdecimal
                    minimum: 0
                    type: number
                subtotalDiscountAmount:
                    example: 11
                    format: bigdecimal
                    minimum: 0
                    type: number
                subtotalDiscountPercentageLevel1:
                    example: 20
                    format: bigdecimal
                    minimum: 0
                    type: number
                subtotalDiscountPercentageLevel2:
                    example: 0
                    format: bigdecimal
                    minimum: 0
                    type: number
                subtotalDiscountPercentageLevel3:
                    example: 0
                    format: bigdecimal
                    minimum: 0
                    type: number
                subtotalDiscountPercentageLevel4:
                    example: 0
                    format: bigdecimal
                    minimum: 0
                    type: number
                taxAmount:
                    example: 11
                    format: bigdecimal
                    minimum: 0
                    type: number
                total:
                    example: 113
                    format: bigdecimal
                    minimum: 0
                    type: number
                totalDiscountAmount:
                    example: 11
                    format: bigdecimal
                    minimum: 0
                    type: number
                totalDiscountPercentageLevel1:
                    example: 20
                    format: bigdecimal
                    minimum: 0
                    type: number
                totalDiscountPercentageLevel2:
                    example: 0
                    format: bigdecimal
                    minimum: 0
                    type: number
                totalDiscountPercentageLevel3:
                    example: 0
                    format: bigdecimal
                    minimum: 0
                    type: number
                totalDiscountPercentageLevel4:
                    example: 0
                    format: bigdecimal
                    minimum: 0
                    type: number
                transactionId:
                    type: string
            required:
                - channelId
                - currencyCode
            type: object
        OrderItem:
            properties:
                bookedQuantityId:
                    example: 32144
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                customFields:
                    additionalProperties: true
                    type: object
                deliveryGroup:
                    example: separate package
                    type: string
                discountAmount:
                    example: 2
                    format: bigdecimal
                    minimum: 0
                    type: number
                discountPercentageLevel1:
                    example: 20
                    format: bigdecimal
                    minimum: 0
                    type: number
                discountPercentageLevel2:
                    example: 0
                    format: bigdecimal
                    minimum: 0
                    type: number
                discountPercentageLevel3:
                    example: 0
                    format: bigdecimal
                    minimum: 0
                    type: number
                discountPercentageLevel4:
                    example: 0
                    format: bigdecimal
                    minimum: 0
                    type: number
                externalReferenceCode:
                    example: AB-34098-789-N
                    type: string
                finalPrice:
                    example: 200
                    format: bigdecimal
                    minimum: 0
                    type: number
                id:
                    example: 30130
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                name:
                    additionalProperties:
                        type: string
                    example:
                        en_US: Hand Saw
                        hr_HR: Product Name HR
                        hu_HU: Product Name HU
                    type: object
                orderExternalReferenceCode:
                    example: CAB-34098-789-N
                    type: string
                orderId:
                    example: 30128
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                printedNote:
                    example: Order item printed note
                    type: string
                promoPrice:
                    example: 101
                    format: bigdecimal
                    minimum: 0
                    type: number
                quantity:
                    example: 2
                    format: int32
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                requestedDeliveryDate:
                    example: 2017-07-21
                    format: date
                    type: string
                shippedQuantity:
                    example: 1
                    format: int32
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                shippingAddress:
                    $ref: "#/components/schemas/ShippingAddress"
                shippingAddressId:
                    example: 31130
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                sku:
                    example: "12341234"
                    type: string
                skuExternalReferenceCode:
                    example: CAB-34098-789-N
                    type: string
                skuId:
                    example: 30128
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                subscription:
                    example: true
                    type: boolean
                unitPrice:
                    example: 101
                    format: bigdecimal
                    minimum: 0
                    type: number
            type: object
        OrderNote:
            properties:
                author:
                    example: Alessio Antonio Rendina
                    type: string
                content:
                    example: This order will be shipped separately
                    type: string
                externalReferenceCode:
                    example: AB-34098-789-N
                    type: string
                id:
                    example: 30130
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                orderExternalReferenceCode:
                    example: CAB-34098-789-N
                    type: string
                orderId:
                    example: 30128
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                restricted:
                    example: true
                    type: boolean
            type: object
        ShippingAddress:
            properties:
                city:
                    example: Diamond Bar
                    type: string
                countryISOCode:
                    example: US
                    type: string
                description:
                    example: right stairs, first room on the left
                    type: string
                id:
                    example: 31130
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                latitude:
                    example: 33.9976884
                    format: double
                    type: number
                longitude:
                    example: -117.8144595
                    format: double
                    type: number
                name:
                    example: Alessio Antonio Rendina
                    type: string
                phoneNumber:
                    example: (123) 456 7890
                    type: string
                regionISOCode:
                    example: CA
                    type: string
                street1:
                    example: 1400 Montefino Ave
                    type: string
                street2:
                    example: 1st floor
                    type: string
                street3:
                    example: suite 200
                    type: string
                zip:
                    example: "91765"
                    type: string
            required:
                - city
                - countryISOCode
                - name
                - street1
            type: object
    securitySchemes:
        BasicAuth:
            scheme: basic
            type: http
        BearerAuth:
            scheme: bearer
            type: http
        OAuth2:
            flows:
                authorizationCode:
                    authorizationUrl: /oauth/authorize
                    scopes:
                        CommerceOpenApiAdmin.admin: Grants access to admin operations
                        CommerceOpenApiAdmin.read: Grants read access
                        CommerceOpenApiAdmin.write: Grants write access
                    tokenUrl: /oauth/token
            type: oauth2
info:
    contact:
        email: team-commerce@liferay.com
        name: Commerce Team
    description:
        Liferay Commerce Admin Order API
    license:
        name: GNU Lesser General Public License 2.1
        url: https://www.gnu.org/licenses/lgpl-2.1.html
    title: Liferay Commerce Admin Order API
    version: v1.0
